extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    MUSC103 and (MUSC203 or MUSC204 or MUSC205)
Corequisite    MUSC293 or MUSC291 or permission of the School.

basic.description: A study of art music in Canada since 1930 with an emphasis on specific composers and their works.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Canadian Music since 1930
